system.description:
Though it comes in various forms, you have grasped that on some level, magic is magic and you have begun to transcend the usual limits of your diversified magical study. You gain the following benefits:

  • If a spell is on the base wizard and druid list (excluding additions to either class list from archetypes, feats, and similar sources), and you have at least one spell slot of a level that could be used to cast it, your druid levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of learning that spell. 
  • Half your druid levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.aap4al37tcw2f7o6]{Spell Study} feature. When you acquire the Spell Study feature, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i7sjopxbjvclb69o]{Fauna and Flora} option for free and also choose a second option.
  • Half your wizard levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l3qkjox9faldupcy]{Druidic Lore} feature.
